name: DIG DUG DEAD.
description:
Dig Dug Dead is a 2-player competitive arcade game where you carve tunnels in the earth to lead unsuspecting masses into  demonic death pits deep underground. Undercut your competitor's tunnel to re-route the unsuspecting souls and prove yourself as the superior demonic overlord.

CONTROLS: (Gamepad Controller recommended)

Red Demon
- WASD or Left Joystick to move
- TAB or A Button to dash

Blue Demon
- Arrow Keys or Left Joystick to move
- Space Bar or A Button to dash

R - Reset 

First demon to harvest 150 souls wins!
